--- Elizabeth Chase <lizzirrd@...> wrote:

> 
> Nate,
> 
> That particular site seems blackly humorous, but
> here's a real life story about a situation just this
> past this week here in the 
> States:
> 
> http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/6727845/
> 
> Lizzie

Lizzie--

I'm aware of the story, and thanks for reminding us of
the more sobering aspects of human stupidity. However,
I'll point out the website IS satirical, and nowhere
is anything like the events that took place in this
horrible affair mentioned or condoned. 

My thoughts and prayers go out to the spirit of that
young woman, her husband who's now left alone to take
care of the child, and that poor child who will never
meet it's mother. 

While it's important to take things toungue in cheek,
we should remember that some things are serious. And
while we should take some things seriously, it's
important to remember there are other things that are
intended as jokes, and should be taken so. 

Nate
